title: Antique Roman?! Help! LOVE this, can't find the font.
content:
I absolutely love and adore this font and after countless hours! of diligently searching and answering over 30 questions in identifont, I still haven't been able to find this. I'm hopeful someone out there can help me!

THANK YOU!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110851im_/http:/typophile.com/files/emlfy%20font_5281.jpg)
author: frostedfemme

comments.content: WOW!!! You're amazing!!! Thank you SO much Akira1975! I really appreciate the expedited response.
